index.js(12,17): error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.


==== index.js (1 errors) ====
    class C {
      constructor() {
        this.foo = () => {
          console.log("called arrow");
        };
      }
      foo() {
        console.log("called method");
      }
    }
    
    class D extends C {
                    ~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
      foo() {
        console.log("SUPER:");
        super.foo();
        console.log("THIS:");
        this.foo();
      }
    }
    
    const obj = new D();
    obj.foo();
    D.prototype.foo.call(obj);
